name: Rebirth evolution
description:
Build your own survivor base in the near future apocalypse.
Develop and manufacture multi-functional building upgrades and construction bases, cultivate their own survivor forces.


Recruit and cultivate one's own combat personnel, with hundreds of weapons, skills, and clothing to build the strongest team.


Form a team to explore the world, communicate with other forces within the world map, and unite with other human factions.
Collaboration, collaboration. Destroy zombies, prevent the spread of infection in the region, and develop and strengthen one's own power.


Destroy zombie strongholds, reduce regional infection levels, and explore the truth of the world.


Heroes and storylines with various unique skills.
